title.rendered: Myanmar National Airlines in Yangon, Myanmar

content.rendered:
Myanmar National Airlines formerly Union of Burma Airways, Burma Airways, and Myanma Airways, is a state-owned airline and the flag carrier of Myanmar, based in Yangon. It was founded on 1948.  It operates scheduled services to all major domestic destinations and to regional destinations in Asia. Its main base is Yangon International Airport.  Founded in 1948, it is the second oldest airline in Asia after Philippine Airlines.

Myanmar National Airlines Contact Address, Phone, Email, Fax and Website

Address: 104 Kanna Road, Kyauktada Township, Yangon, Myanmar.
Phone: +95 1 378 603, +95 1 377 840
Email: contactus@flymna.com

Myanmar National Airlines
Address: 80 Airport Boulevard, Changi Airport T1 #04-27, Singapore 819642
Phone: +65 62149487/65468616
Fax: +65 62140180
Email: Singaporeops@flymna.com

Sales Office (Bangkok)
GSA Thailand: Mandalay Air Service, Co., Ltd.
Address: 120 Kasemkij Building, 5th Floor, Room 555 Silom Road, Suriyawongse, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500
Phone: +66 982797455, +6622356438
Fax: +66022356439
Email: sales@mandalayairservice.com

Sales Office (Chiang Mai)
GSA Thailand: Mandalay Air Service, Co., Ltd.
Address:215/2 Room.A210-A211, @Curve Communication & Education Mall, Changklan Road, Chang Khlan, Muang Chiang Mai, Chiang Mai 50100
Phone: +6653272454
Mobile: +66819605753
Fax:+6653272453
Email:cnxranveljames@gmail.com

Sales Office (Hong Kong)
GSA Hong Kong: Deks Air (HK) Ltd.
Address:Unit 1805, Jubilee Centre, 18 Fenwick Street, Wanchai, Hong Kong
Phone: +852 2861-1811
Fax: +852 2865-6793
Email: SAGM@deksair.com.hk

Sales Office (Chengdu)
GSA Chengdu: ITA Tours
Address:Room 1503, Building M6, UFun, Gaoxin District, Chengdu
Phone: 8628-63915259-8001
Mobile: +86 15198261838, +86 13281461207
Fax: 8628-63915259
Email: zhou.mian@flymna.com, luo.zheng@flymna.com

Myanmar National Airlines Official website : https://www.flymna.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Myanmar National Airlines

Fleet size: 18

  • ATR 72-600
  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 8
  • Cessna 208 Caravan
  • Embraer 190

Myanmar National Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Myanmar National Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Myanmar National Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. MNA Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Myanmar National Airlines in Yangon, Myanmar Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Myanmar National Airlines in Yangon, Myanmar: (click on the stars below)
